des:
Now you can control your ASUS router through the Alexa Voice Service (AVS). Get the most out of the voice-enabled cloud service by pairing an Alexa-enabled product with a supported ASUS router. The convenience of voice commands means you can get things done without lifting a finger. Alexa is adopting new skills all the time, and now by activating the ASUS Router Alexa skill, you can tell her to suspend the Wi-Fi on your ASUS router for a family dinner without interruptions or enable the guest network when hosting a party.
 
To get started, refer to the following steps to link Alexa to your ASUS Router to enable the ASUS Router Alexa skill. 
 
1. Connect either your PC, notebook, or mobile device to your ASUS Router. 
 
2. Enable the ASUS Router skill by one of two ways:
 
2.1 Ask Alexa to enable ASUS Router skill by voice command: “Alexa, open MY ROUTER” 
(Instructions on how to link your ASUS router are sent to your Alexa account. Just log into your Amazon Alexa account from any of your devices to find out more.)
 
2.2 Visit Amazon Alexa on your PC or notebook, or launch the Alexa app on your mobile device, search ASUS Router skill, then click on the Enable Skill button.
 
3. You will be asked to enter the Alexa activation code, log into your router’s web interface to find it. Go to Advanced Settings → Alexa & IFTTT and click on Get Activation Code, your Alexa activation code will be shown. Enter the activation code and your ASUS router is now linked with your Alexa account.
 
4. Try saying “Alexa, ask MY ROUTER” to find more skills.
 
The following ASUS Skills are supported on ASUS Router :
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER.
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to turn on the Guest Network.
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to turn on the Guest Network for 3 hours.
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to turn off the Guest Network.
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to turn on the Game Mode
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to turn on the Media Mode
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to match a new device. (enable WPS)
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to start again.
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to upgrade the firmware.
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to report security status
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER how many devices are online
• Alexa, ask MY ROUTER to enable surround sound. (Lyra Voice only)
• Alexa, pause Wi-Fi 
• Alexa, resume Wi-Fi 
• Alexa, pause Wi-Fi on PlayStation
• Alexa, resume Wi-Fi for PlayStation for 30 minutes
 
Please keep you ASUS Router to be the latest firmware version for the best experience.
For more information about account link and supported products, visit https://www.asus.com/support/FAQ/1042547
